languages.text: This carapace grants its wearer +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} as well as immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. Base armour property: +10% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This carapace grants its wielder +2 to deflection and +20% armour against fire damage as well as immunity to burning. Base armour property: +10% armour against melee attacks.

languages.text: Este caparazón otorga al portador +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} e inmunidad a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}. languages.text: 当装备者对抗{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}时，获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与+20%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，同时免疫{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果。 基础护甲特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，获得+10%护甲。
languages.original_text: This carapace grants its wearer +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} as well as immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. traits.locale_text: 当装备者对抗{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}时，获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与+20%{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}，同时免疫{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果。 基础护甲特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}时，获得+10%护甲。

languages.text: Cette carapace confère à son utilisateur +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} et +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} contre les {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} ainsi qu'une invulnérabilité à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % d'armure contre les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}.
languages.original_text: This carapace grants its wearer +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} as well as immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. Base armour property: +10% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % d'armure contre les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g}.

languages.text: Dieser Rückenpanzer gewährt dem Träger +2 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}, +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +10 % Rüstung gegen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: This carapace grants its wearer +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} as well as immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. Base armour property: +10% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Rückenpanzer gewährt dem Träger +2 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} und +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +10 % Rüstung gegen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: このカラペースは、使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}+2、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}+20%、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}への耐性を付与する。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}に対してアーマー+10%。
languages.original_text: This carapace grants its wearer +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} as well as immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. Base armour property: +10% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このカラペースは、使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火のダメージ{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} +2および{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g} +20%を付与し、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}の影響を無効化する。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}に対してアーマー +10%

languages.text: Этот панцирь дает +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} и +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}, а также иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горению{/g}. Базовое свойство: +10% к броне против {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атак в ближнем бою{/g}.

languages.text: Bu kabuk, giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarına{/g} karşı {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerine +2, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerine ise +%20 verir. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmaya{/g} karşı bağışıklık kazandırır. Taban zırh özelliği: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş saldırılarına{/g} karşı +%10 zırh.
